
\startenvironment report

	% numbered ToC, chapters on new page

	\setuphead[chapter,section][
		number=yes]

	\definesectionblock[cofolon][cofolon]
	\setupsectionblock[cofolon][
		conversion=romannumerals]

	\setupcombinedlist[content][
		list={chapter,subject,subsubject,section,subsection}]

% idea for chapter names top-right as in vpnt CDE report:
%
% \definetext
%   [fish]    % name, used for \setuphead[...][footer=<name>]
%   [footer]     % location of the text, can be âheaderâ or âfooterâ
%   [chapternumber] % takes the same arguments as \setupheadertexts
% 
% \setuphead
%   [chapter]
%   [header=empty, % donât show any text in the header on chapter pages
%    footer=fish]


	% overridden by \definelayout for chapter first pages
	\setupheadertexts[][\setup{doc:reminder}]

	\setupfootertexts[\setup{doc:classify}][\small\pagenumber]

% first page layout
% TODO: use the same mechanism for a cover page for deliverable reports
\definelayout
	[1]
	[footer=9\bodyfontsize]

\stopenvironment
